projects.title: Miracle Morning Routine App
projects.bodyText:
- Developed Backend of the App, using Nest.Js, MySQL and TypeORM and Created Admin Portal in React Js and tailwind.
 - Leveraged technologies such as Stripe, RevenueCat, ActiveCampaign and AppsFlyer to streamline payment flows and ensure reliable revenue tracking.
 - Developed robust backend APIs , enabling features like meditations, journaling, affirmations, tracks, activity tracking and in-app inbox announcements.
 - Created scripts to automate new audio/visual data uploads to the Database and regulate data on Amazone S3 bucket.

projects.title: Pause Breathe Reflect App
projects.bodyText:
- Contributed to Backend development of the App, using Nest.Js, MySQL and TypeORM and third-party integrations.
 - Developed Optimized APIs to seamlessly integrate features such as Breathworks, meditation music streaming with category filters and journaling.
 - Implemented in-app push notifications for success celebration messages and app updates alerts.
 - Handled package subscriptions with Revenue Cat and kept users data integrated on the App's database.

projects.title: Stock Market Analytics Platform
projects.bodyText:
- Developed frontend using React, Redux, TypeScript ,Material UI, Storybook and Tailwind CSS
 - integrated UI/UX design graphs such as bar and line graphs for visual representation of data.
 - Successfully implemented stock filtering functionality on the automated scraped data.
 - converted the project from JavaScript to TypeScript for enhanced maintainability.
 - Utilized Storybook for isolated UI component visualization.
 - Developed test suites, validating the functionality and behavior of components.

projects.title: E-commerce - Clothing Store
projects.bodyText:
- Ecommerce clothing website developed with MERN stack, Material UI, JavaScript, HTML and Styled-components,  along with admin panel that offers a seamless shopping experience.
 - From secure payment processing and intuitive checkout, to the ability to favorite items for later.
 - Includes features of checkout and payment precessing.
 - It can offer discounts and sale offers to valued customer.
 - Behind the scenes, admin panel ensures smooth operations, making it easy to manage inventory, orders, and more.

projects.title: Web Chat App
projects.bodyText:
- Web chat app, powered by WebSockets (Socket.io), Build using React, MongoDB, Node Js and Express, offers real-time messaging capabilities.
 - Material UI is used for components and theme, and user Registration and authentication is implemented.
 - The feature of login and authentication is present to secure user information.
 - Allow users to express themselves in emojis and sending files.

projects.title: Online Food Delivery Website
projects.bodyText:
- Web App that allow users to cook through recipes built using **React**, **Node Js**, **MongoDB** and **React-Bootstrap**.
 - Data management done with Redux and API integration and React-bootsrap is used for styling.
 - User Authentication is implemented and Admin panel is created to allow clients to manage the orders.
 - Offers food recipies to users with extensive details.
 - Allow users to select throught categories and apply filters to find desired recipe. 
 - Allow users to add their own food to the collection.

projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support
